H0.text: Which word begining with V describes the type of image formed when light is reflected from a plane mirror. Vibrant

H1.text: Which word begining with V describes the type of image formed when light is reflected from a plane mirror. Variable

H2.text: Which word begining with V describes the type of image formed when light is reflected from a plane mirror. Vector

H3.text: Which word begining with V describes the type of image formed when light is reflected from a plane mirror. VIRTUAL

A4.text: A plane mirror forms a virtual image positioned behind the mirror.

A5.text: The image in a plane mirror is not magnified (that is, the image is the same size as the object) and appears to be as far behind the mirror as the object is in front of the mirror.
